pr_title: [JENKINS-60563] Replace MD5 with SHA-256 in ConsistentHash

timeline.message:
[JENKINS-60563] Replace MD5 with SHA-256 in ConsistentHash

- Also update outdated link
- Reformat some of the code
- Adjust the tests
- Ignore the performance test
- Correct typos

timeline.bodyText: Fine with me, is the performance difference for this implementation noteworthy?
timeline.author: res0nance

replies.bodyText:
No tested due to Hash function comparison, the difference should be around 5-10% between MD5 and SHA-256.
It's not like we are moving from MD5 to BCrypt :)
replies.author: Wadeck
